steps.expected_result: The page should be loaded successfully
The AI should suggest questions based on the job description
The questions should be relevant to the job description

steps.input: 2-year experienced JavaScript developer with AWS experience
steps.expected_result: The AI should generate a complete job description
The job description should be accurate and relevant to the job title
The selected skills should be displayed
The edited question should be saved successfully

steps.step: Click on the role-based questions tab
steps.expected_result: The role-based questions should be displayed
The edited question should be saved successfully
The interview should be created successfully

steps.step: Verify the unique public interview link
steps.expected_result: The link should be displayed and functional

title: Test candidate video interview submission
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview response
expected_result: The candidate's video interview response is displayed with scores and resume

title: Test interview score display
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview response
expected_result: The candidate's interview score is displayed

title: Test communication score display
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview response
expected_result: The candidate's communication score is displayed

title: Test AI analysis scoring
steps: Visit the interview screenings section
Select a candidate's video interview response
expected_result: The AI analysis scores are displayed for the selected candidate

title: Test candidate ré screening
steps: Create an interview and upload multiple résumés
Submit the résumés for screening
expected_result: The AI conducts a comprehensive semantic analysis and assigns a ré score for each candidate

title: Test ré score display
steps: Visit the ré screening results
Select a candidate's résumé
expected_result: The candidate's ré score is displayed along with the AI recommendation

title: Test AI recommendation logic
steps: Visit the ré screening results
Select a candidate's résumé with a high score but not recommended by the AI
expected_result: The AI recommendation logic is correctly applied, considering the candidate's overall experience in relation to the job description

title: Test interview link sending
steps: Visit the ré screening results
Select a candidate's résumé and decide to proceed
Send an interview link to the candidate
expected_result: The interview link is sent to the candidate and is valid for 24 hours

title: Test interview submission and review
steps: Wait for the candidate to submit their interview
Visit the responses tab
Click on the candidate's interview response
expected_result: The candidate's interview response is displayed with scores and resume, and the AI analysis summary is available
